snippet: Trisha Brown, who has helped define contemporary dance performance, will leave the company she founded because of health problems.
abstract: Trisha Brown, who has helped define contemporary dance performance, will leave the company she founded because of health problems, but has given her blessing to its continued existence.
lead_paragraph: Trisha Brown, who has helped define contemporary dance performance, will leave the company she founded because of health problems.

headline.seo: Trisha Brown Is Leaving Dance Company Bearing Her Name
headline.main: Health Troubles Cause Trisha Brown to Leave Her Dance Company
headline.print_headline: Health Troubles Cause Trisha Brown to Leave Her Dance Company
